ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description: A Python package for smoothing and refining geometries derived from raster data classifications. Smoothify transforms jagged polygons and lines resulting from raster-to-vector conversion into smooth, visually appealing features using an optimized implementation of Chaikin's corner-cutting algorithm.
about.summary: Transform pixelated geometries from raster data into smooth natural looking features

about.description: A Python package for smoothing and refining geometries derived from raster data classifications. Smoothify transforms jagged polygons and lines resulting from raster-to-vector conversion into smooth, visually appealing features using an optimized implementation of Chaikin's corner-cutting algorithm.
about.summary: Transform pixelated geometries from raster data into smooth natural looking features

name: smoothify
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "smoothify" %}
{% set version = "0.1.3" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/smoothify-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6bf701cb57ef50d2d94271c1c67dc470daaa7706aede1d6d178148cf2236f5c6

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools >=61.0
    - pip
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - geopandas >=1.0.0
    - joblib >=1.4.0
    - numpy >=1.27.0
    - scipy >=1.11.0
    - shapely >=2.0.2

test:
  imports:
    - smoothify
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/DPIRD-DMA/Smoothify
  summary: Transform pixelated geometries from raster data into smooth natural looking features
  description: A Python package for smoothing and refining geometries derived from raster data classifications. Smoothify transforms jagged polygons and lines resulting from raster-to-vector conversion into smooth, visually appealing features using an optimized implementation of Chaikin's corner-cutting algorithm.
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  dev_url: https://github.com/DPIRD-DMA/Smoothify

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - wrignj08
    - giswqs
